mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gillespie Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located on Silverleaf Road adjacent to 1123 Silverleaf Road. Property is owned by the Blue Ridge Parkway. Cemetery was cleaned by BRP volunteers in April, 2021. N 36 55.980' W 80 11.249' Directions: From Floyd go north on Rt. 221, right on Shooting Creek Rd. to the Blue Ridge Pkwy.. Turn left and go 4 miles to Cannady's Gap Rd.SE, turn left and make an immediate right on to Smartview Road SE. Go about 1/2 mile and turn onto Silverleaf Road (gravel). Go 1.2 miles. The cemetery is on the right with a green plaque. BRP Smartview facility is on the opposite side of the BRP.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
